fields_of_interest: Agriculture, Trade, Consumers, International co-operation and development, Energy, Environment, Single market, Food Safety, Climate Action
section: IV - Think tanks, research and academic institutions
goals__remit:
Farm Europe is a think tank that aims to stimulate thinking on rural economies in the European Union. The think tank focuses on all policy areas that impact on rural business with a strong emphasis on agriculture and food policies, particularly the Common Agricultural Policy (CAP), but also food standards, the food chain, environment, energy and trade issues. 
 
Farm Europe is an independent, creative and engaged voice contributing to the debate via the research of its own team, its publications and events, and the work of its members and partners. 
 
The think tank itself has no political orientations. Our goal is to stimulate thinking with all partners and members. The think tank has its own multicultural team of recognised senior experts.
relevant_communication: Farm Europe organises events, publishes policy briefings, leaflets and all kind of documents on all the topics covered by its work available on our website (www.farm-europe.eu)
